name: alexandradolan
body:
# Alexandra R Dolan
6303 Auburn Avenue  
Bradenton, Florida 34207  
941-357-6095  
<http://alexandradolan.com>  
<alexandra@alexandradolan.com>  

***

##Profile

Experienced software trainer specializing in curriculum and instructional design, software training, needs analysis, assessment and evaluation, systems administration, and information management. Interested in using technology to provide real-world sustainable solutions.â€¨
##Skills

* Ability to learn and utilize any software quickly
* Web design/development (HTML, CSS, Javascript)
* Multimedia design/development
* Software documentation
* Member, Apple Developer Program
* Proficiencies include: 
	* Adobe Creative Suite/Adobe Creative Cloud applications 
		* Dreamweaver, Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Acrobat
	* Micorosft Office Suite
		* Word, Excel, PowerPoint
	* Apple iWork
		* Pages, Numbers, Keynote

##Experience

####LearningSpace Clinical Trainer/Software Solutions Educator CAE Healthcare/METI	
```Sarasota, Florida```				```2011-2013```

* Designed curriculum, eLearning, multimedia instructional materials, and documentation to support LearningSpace users.
* Provided support and education and training for LearningSpace software by conducting in-house, on-site and web based trainings for new and existing users of LearningSpace.  
* Salesforce training and support; provided consultations, and in-house, on-site and web-based sales demonstrations to prospective clients
* Attended and presented at major education conferences and open houses to meet with customers and stay on the cutting edge of emerging market trends and customer needs. 
* Participated in product design, research and development requirements for LearningSpace and new and emerging educational products. 

####Instructor, Buffalo Creek Middle School
```Palmetto, Florida```				```2010-2011```

* Degreed, certified, highly qualified teacher for Manatee County Schools, teaching  seventh and eighth grade Language Arts and Journalism courses. 
* Provided specialized instruction and assessment strategies mandated by Manatee Core Curriculum to students through demonstration and modeling.

####Substitute Teacher, School District of Manatee County
 ```Bradenton, Florida```				```2007-2010```

* Degreed, certified, highly qualified teacher for Manatee County Schools, teaching a variety of subjects, classifications, and grade levels. 
* Professional Educator Certifications in Social Sciences Grades 6-12, Middle Grades Integrated Curriculum Grades 5-9, and English 6-12. 

####Sales Associate, Lakewood Financial Services, Inc.
 ```Bradenton, Florida```				```2006-2007```
 
* Facilitating, quoting, and binding new business in person, on the phone, and via email.
* Service and assist existing clients
* Utilize Doris (TAM) Database System, Adobe Acrobat, and Microsoft Office Suite.

####Processor, Oswald, Trippe and Company, Inc.

 ```Sarasota, Florida```				```2005-2006```

* Provide technological, administrative and customer support for insurance sales associates
* Responsible for answering phones, greeting customers, scanning, data entry, processing, database management, materials and resource management, and other IT functions
* Worked with Microsoft Office Suite, and Applied (TAM) database system coordinated with ETFile paperless scanning system


####Community Affairs Associate, American Red Cross Manatee Chapter
 ```Bradenton, Florida```				```2005-2006```

* Create content for programs, advertisements, promotional campaigns, educational programs, and chapter website
* Design, fabricate, organize and updating disaster relief press kit
* Managed chapter website, produced public relations and marketing materials, and press kits
* Collaborated with staff and volunteers in planning, coordinating, and executing special events

####Secretary, University of Florida Campus Independents 
```Gainesville, Florida```				```2003-2004```

* Chartered Campus Independents as a student organization
* Oversaw fundraising for the Organization
* Attended political conferences in New York City in January of 2003 as a delegate from the University of Florida

####Pre-Press Input Personnel, Sarasota Herald-Tribune 
```Sarasota, Florida```				```2001```

* Fabricated raw text for graphic design
* Edited advertising copy for publication

####Sales Associate, Heitel Jewelers of Bradenton	
```Bradenton, Florida```				```1999-2008```

* Sales of fine jewelry, watches, and custom-designed jewelry
* Created website, marketing, and promotional materials. 


##Education

#### M.Ed.Curriculum and Instruction/Educational Technology, University of Florida
```Gainesville, Florida```				```2011``` ```GPA 4.0```


#### B.A.Political Science University of Florida
```Gainesville, Florida```				```2004``` ```GPA 3.45```
